remediation: Upgrade gradio to version 4.10.0 or higher.
title: Server-side Request Forgery (SSRF)

vulnDescription.Overview: gradio is a Python library for easily interacting with trained machine learning models Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Server-side Request Forgery (SSRF) using the /file route since it used to perform a GET/HEAD request to determine if a filepath was a possible URL.
